where true and

with id_list as (select unnest(${unnest}::bigint[]) "${column}2") select * from marker inner join id_list on marker.${column}=id_list."${column}2"
where true and
${ew.customSqlSegment} del_flag = false

from marker as m inner join ( select distinct marker_id from marker_item_link, id_list

${ew.customSqlSegment} marker_item_link.${column}=id_list."${column}2" ) marker_id_list on m.id = marker_id_list.marker_id where m.del_flag = false
